time_from_scan.Description: Number of days between that video's memory and the scan date

emotion.Description: Answer to: 'how would you describe your emotions for this event?'
emotion.Levels: 0: No response, 1: Very negative, 2: somewhat negative, 3: neutral, 4: somewhat positive, 5: very positive

memory_strength.Description: Answer to: 'how strong is your memory for this event?'
memory_strength.Levels: 0: No response, 1: Very weak, 5: Very strong

face_or_not.Description: Whether there was a face in the video or not.

person_familiarity.Description: Familiarity of the face in the video.
person_familiarity.Levels: 0: No response, 1: New person, 2: familiar person, 3: Self

place_familiarity.Description: Familiarity of the place in the video.
place_familiarity.Levels: 0: No response, 1: New place, 2: familiar place
